backend/main.mo: Defines access‑controlled user profiles and QR‑code history storage with CRUD-style query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature-to-file mappings with metadata for implemented QR generator features and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all frontend modules for build/reference purposes.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the PWA manifest, icons, QR code CDN script, and React app root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, theme, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first offline support and cache version management.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling auth state, profile setup, generator/history tabs, and selected history item flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting first-time users to save a display name with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryI: Renders a single QR history entry with content preview, metadata, open action, and delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryV: Displays the user's saved QR history with loading, error, and empty states, rendering each item via HistoryItemRow.
Provides the main app layout with header, footer, branding, and a login button wrapper around child content.
frontend/src/components/qr/ContentForm.t: Form for entering QR content and type with validation before triggering QR generation.
frontend/src/components/qr/CustomizePane: UI for adjusting QR settings such as size and colors, including a reset option.
frontend/src/components/qr/DownloadButto: Downloads the generated QR code canvas as a PNG and shows status notifications.
frontend/src/components/qr/QRCodePreview: Generates and displays a live QR code preview on a canvas with error handling.
frontend/src/components/qr/QRGenerator.t: Main QR generation flow combining content input, customization, preview, and actions like download and save.
frontend/src/components/qr/SaveToHistory: Saves generated QR data to history if authenticated, showing alerts or loading states accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, recreating it on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and QR code history using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark themes and custom color scales.
frontend/src/lib/qr/defaults.ts: Defines QR code settings and provides default configuration values.
frontend/src/lib/qr/generator.ts: Wraps the QRCode library to render QR codes onto a canvas with configurable styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker and logs update events to notify when new content is available.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, image requirements, and pending feature requests for a QR-generation web app with optional account-based saving. Acts as the central state and requirements record for the build.
